==Trivia==
*{{Lang|{{w|Semyon Yanovsky}}|ru=Семён Яновский|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Семён Яновский}}}}, was a Russian naval officer who was appointed in late 1818 as Chief Manager of the {{w|Russian-American Company}}, serving into 1820.
